data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Fujairah. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Fujairah, United Arab Emirates

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Fujairah, United Arab Emirates to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 150,202 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 84 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Fujairah. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Fujairah.
Jesus, I pray that all the Arab, Omani people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Arab, Omani people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Arab, Omani people is yours.
Over 93.67 percent of the people of Fujairah are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Jesus, 152,000 people live in the state of Fujairah. Please, give them 30 new simple churches this year.

data.section_summary:
the state of Fujairah, United Arab Emirates has a population of 152,000.

We estimate Fujairah has 1,799 people who might know Jesus, 7,821 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 142,381 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 84 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Fujairah to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
